attributes.action: let people wrongly convicted and sent to prison who get compensation for their miscarriage of justice keep all their compensation and not be forced to pay for their lodgings while in prison as it was not their fault.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently, innocent individuals wrongly convicted and sent to prison have been told they have to pay for their lodgings in prison out of their compensation settlement.

It is unfair that innocent individuals are forced to pay out of their compensation whereas the guilty get it for free so those who were wrongly convicted should keep all their compensation, otherwise it is punishing the innocent more than the guilty.
